QuestData.Title: The Inner Circle
QuestData.Description: With their outer sentries gone, the greater members of the Shadow Council are next.$B$BDeep within the corrupted barrow dens you'll find powerful Jaedenar Warlocks, Hunters, Enforcers, Darkweavers, and Legionnaires.$B$BThey must be defeated if these lands are to be saved!
QuestData.RewardText: The cleansing of Shadow Hold will take much time and effort, but without your defeat of the Shadow Council, it would not be possible at all. Thank you, $n.
